content: All spaces will become unavailable during the encryption process. Are you sure you want to continue?

comment.text: The EncryptWarningDialogContent translation key is used to display a confirmation message before encrypting data. When decrypted status changes to encrypted, this text prompts the user for confirmation before proceeding with encryption. It appears in a ModalDialog Footer.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'سيتم جعل جميع المساحات غير متاحة أثناء عملية التشفير' is technically correct but sounds overly formal and awkward in Arabic. A more natural phrasing would better convey the meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: سيتم تعطيل جميع المساحات خلال عملية التشفير. هل أنت متأكد من المتابعة؟

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English uses a question mark at the end.  The Arabic translation also needs a question mark at the end.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure a question mark is present at the end of the Arabic translation: سيتم تعطيل جميع المساحات خلال عملية التشفير؟

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'spaces' is translated as 'úložiště', which translates to 'storage' or 'repositories'. While functionally close, 'úložiště' doesn't convey the same meaning of 'spaces' in this context. 'Prostory' might be a more accurate translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Během procesu šifrování budou všechna *prostory* nedostupná. Určitě chcete pokračovat?

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Während des Verschlüsselungsvorgangs sind alle Spaces nicht mehr verfügbar' is too literal and sounds unnatural in German. 'Spaces' should be translated to a more appropriate term depending on the context, likely 'Bereiche' or 'Arbeitsbereiche'. The entire sentence structure is also somewhat clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Während des Verschlüsselungsvorgangs sind alle Bereiche/Arbeitsbereiche nicht mehr verfügbar. Möchten Sie wirklich fortfahren?

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'Spaces' in the German translation without article ('die Spaces') is incorrect. Although sometimes used, it is generally better to translate it more naturally.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: This is addressed with the correction in the 'incorrect_translation' suggestion.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ກາຍເປັນບໍ່ສາມາດໃຊ້ໄດ້' could be improved. While technically correct, it's a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would convey the idea of being inaccessible or unavailable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຊ່ອງຫວ່າງທັງໝົດຈະບໍ່ສາມາດໃຊ້ໄດ້ໃນລະຫວ່າງຂະບວນການເຂົ້າລະຫັດ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation uses a full stop (period) after 'ເຂົ້າລະຫັດ'.  Consider whether this is consistent with standard Lao punctuation for this type of dialog content. A question mark might be more appropriate given the context of a confirmation dialog.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຊ່ອງຫວ່າງທັງໝົດຈະບໍ່ສາມາດໃຊ້ໄດ້ໃນລະຫວ່າງຂະບວນການເຂົ້າລະຫັດ?

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation uses "odszyfrowywania" which means "decryption" instead of "encryption". The English says 'encryption'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Wszystkie obszary będą niedostępne podczas procesu szyfrowania. Czy na pewno chcesz kontynuować?

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase " හිස්තැන් නොමැති වනු ඇත" (histaen nemaathi vanu ath) translates to "places will be unavailable" which is not a direct or accurate translation of "All spaces will become unavailable". It implies physical places rather than access to spaces.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be something like "සියළු ස්ථාන භාවිත කිරීමට අවලංගු වනු ඇත" (siyalu sthana vaishathya karamnu ath) which means 'All spaces will become unusable' or "සියළුම ප්‍රදේශ අතුරුදහන් වනු ඇත" (siyalum pradēsha athrudahanu ath) which means "all areas will disappear".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure "ඔබට දිගටම කරගෙන යාමට අවශ්‍ය බව විශ්වාසද?" (obata digatama karagena yamuṭa avashyaya bava vishvasada?) sounds a bit formal and unnatural for a warning dialog. The phrasing 'ඔබට විශ්වාසද?' (obata vishvasada?) is a more common and natural way to ask if the user is sure.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change the sentence to "ඔබට විශ්වාසද?" (obata vishvasada?) or a similar phrasing like "ඔබට මෙය කරගෙන යන්න විශ්වාසද?" (obata iya karagena yanna vishvasada?)
